Welcome to Bratz Magazine! Here's some important information:

Web Accessibility Practices

We are committed to making our website accessible to everyone. To improve accessibility, we follow these basic practices:

  • Use descriptive alt text for images.
  • Provide keyboard navigation and focus styles.
  • Ensure readable font sizes and contrast.
  • Include semantic HTML elements.
